items.sentence: I don\'t think Tom understood the instructions.
I can\'t tell you when that\'s going to happen.
Mary is depressed because her husband left her.
Mary is going to ask Tom to eat lunch with her.
Tom\'s mother forced him to eat his vegetables.
Tom\'s paternal grandparents live in Australia.
Nobody from Tom\'s family attended the wedding.
Tom has been to Australia more times than Mary.
Tom came back from Boston the week before last.
Let\'s keep this between us for the time being.
